name: Spaced Out
description:
This is the game Spaced Out. A game where you are play as the sole agent of the Jupiter Jets Real Estate Agency. Your rivals, the Saturn Sharks, are aggressively buying up all of the real estate across the universe. Beat those sharks before space runs out!

*** Navigation and shop not implemented, so enjoy chilling out and killing enemy real estate agents! You can't die =) ***

Mouse to Control Ship Direction

W - Boost

E - Brake

Q / E - Roll Left/Right

This game was made for Ludum Dare 42 Compo, but I ran out of time so it's a jam entry.  All art, music and programming were created by me.
